item.title: First-Explore, then Exploit: Meta-Learning to Solve Hard Exploration-Exploitation Trade-Offs
item.description: Meta-RL agents often fail to explore effectively in environments where optimal behavior requires sacrificing immediate rewards for greater future gains. First-Explore, a novel method, tackles this by…
